message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to offer it to you for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $180.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit steep for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $150.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $170.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, $170 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $160.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165, Bob. I think that's a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, $165 is still a bit too high for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $155.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $160, Bob. I think that's the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but $160 is still a bit of a stretch for me. I'm thinking more along the lines of $150. This is my final offer.
